001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.DomainObject;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
005
006/**
007 * This class represents a specific distance metrics to calculate the distances.
008 */
009@DomainObject
010@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
011public interface DistanceMetric {
012
013    /**
014     * Calculates the distance between the 2 points
015     *
016     * @param point1 point1 to compare
017     * @param point2 point2 to compare
018     * @return the difference between point1 and point2
019     */
020    float distance(Float[] point1, Float[] point2);
021
022}
